channel.title: 562 Help needed
channel.description:
I am using the bulletscape 562 source+client
I had to edit the run.bat file in the source quite a bit to get it to work, but i eventually did. I made some changes until when i tried to compile i got a few errors ================================================================================
Preparing... A subdirectory or file bin already exists. The system cannot find the file specified. The system cannot find the file specified. Compiling core... Compiling loginserver... Compiling packet handlers... Compiling logging system... Complete. Complete. ================================================================================
Press any key to continue . . .
This is what i edited the bat to @echo off title rs2hd compiler echo ================================================================================ echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling loginserver... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo Compiling packet handlers... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling logging system... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java echo Complete. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java echo Complete. echo ================================================================================ pause
All i edited was the jdk to my version
@echo off title Shapescape By Circlex cd src cd .. "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause
I edited the run.bat to make it actually run, other wise i got "failed to construct rs2hd" error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs2hd/Mai n : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.rs2hd.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
That is the error message, forgive me if its something stupid because im new to coding 562's

item.title: 562 Help needed
item.dc:creator: @Circlex Circlex
item.description:
@Circlex wrote:

I am using the bulletscape 562 source+client

I had to edit the run.bat file in the source quite a bit to get it to work, but i eventually did. I made some changes until when i tried to compile i got a few errors

Preparing…
A subdirectory or file bin already exists.
The system cannot find the file specified.
The system cannot find the file specified.
Compiling core…
Compiling loginserver…
Compiling packet handlers…
Compiling logging system…
Complete.
Complete.

Press any key to continue . . .

This is what i edited the bat to
@echo off
title rs2hd compiler
echo ================================================================================
echo Preparing…
mkdir bin
cd src
copy log4j.xml …
cd …
move log4j.xml bin/
echo Compiling core…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling loginserver…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java
echo Compiling packet handlers…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/packethandler/.java
echo Compiling logging system…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/util/log/SLF4JAppender.java
echo Complete.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/.java
echo Complete.
echo ================================================================================
pause

All i edited was the jdk to my version

@echo off
title Shapescape By Circlex
cd src
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main
pause

I edited the run.bat to make it actually run, other wise i got “failed to construct rs2hd” error

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: com/rs2hd/Mai
n : Unsupported major.minor version 51.0
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: com.rs2hd.Main. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

That is the error message, forgive me if its something stupid because im new to coding 562’s

Read full topic
